duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and approve client requests, ensuring proper authorizations and supporting documentation meet policy requirements.
Coordinate and process team-specific tasks as requested by the business.
Perform quality reviews of team members' completed work and ensure data accuracy.
Work across multiple systems and platforms, interface with teams and businesses to resolve ongoing issues, and answer policy questions.
Provide support and work on special projects as requested, apply business judgment to identify unusual or suspicious activities, and escalate issues as appropriate.
Understand and adhere to all policies and procedures, including quality, client service, information security, and compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
